# `usage generate`

- **Usage**: `usage generate [-h --help] <SUBCOMMAND>`
- **Aliases**: `g`
- **Source code**: [`cli/src/cli/generate.rs`](https://github.com/jdx/usage/blob/main/cli/src/cli/generate.rs)

## Flags

### `-h --help`
